title: Why do teachers keep on staring at me? It doesn't matter where I'm sitting. - Quora

response.answer_text: Your teacher may stare at you constantly because of the following reasons: They (he/she) thinks you’re an interesting and an intelligent student.May just stare at you because they’re that sort of person.Could be staring at someone else behind you/right near you.It all depends on the context, situation, environment, etc…
